id.description: The unique identifier for the order

createdAt.description: The date and time when the order was created

createdBy.description: Information about the user who created the order

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the order was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: Information about the user who last modified the order

completedAt.description: The date and time when the order was completed

orderNumber.description: The order number for the order

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer

customerEmail.description: The email address of the customer

anonymousId.description: A unique identifier for a user who is not logged in

store.description: The store associated with the order

id.description: The unique identifier for the line item

productId.description: The unique identifier for the product associated with the line item

name.description: The name of the line item

productSlug.description: The slug of the product associated with the line item

productType.description: The type of product associated with the line item

variant.description: Information about the variant of the product in the line item

price.description: The price of the line item

taxedPrice.description: The taxed price for the line item

totalPrice.description: The total price of the line item

quantity.description: The quantity of the line item

addedAt.description: The date and time when the line item was added

state.description: State information related to the line item

taxRate.description: The tax rate for the line item

supplyChannel.description: The channel responsible for supplying the line item

distributionChannel.description: The channel through which the line item is distributed

discountedPricePerQuantity.description: Discounted price per quantity for the line item

priceMode.description: The mode of pricing for the line item

lineItemMode.description: The mode of the line item

custom.description: Custom data related to the line item

shippingDetails.description: Information about the shipping details for the line item

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the line item was last modified

customLineItems.description: Custom line items in the order

id.description: The unique identifier for the custom line item

name.description: The name of the custom line item

money.description: The monetary value associated with the custom line item

taxedPrice.description: The taxed price for the custom line item

totalPrice.description: The total price of the custom line item

slug.description: The slug of the custom line item

quantity.description: The quantity of the custom line item

state.description: State information related to the custom line item

taxCategory.description: The tax category for the custom line item

taxRate.description: The tax rate for the custom line item

discountedPricePerQuantity.description: Discounted price per quantity for the custom line item

custom.description: Custom data related to the custom line item

shippingDetails.description: Information about the shipping details for the custom line item

totalPrice.description: The total price of the order

taxedPrice.description: The total taxed price for the order

shippingAddress.description: The address to which the order is shipped

billingAddress.description: The address where the billing information is associated with

taxMode.description: The mode of tax handling for the order

taxRoundingMode.description: The rounding mode for tax calculations

taxCalculationMode.description: The mode of tax calculation for the order

customerGroup.description: The group to which the customer belongs

country.description: The country associated with the order

paymentState.description: The state of payment for the order

shippingInfo.description: Shipping information including deliveries and pricing details

shippingMethodName.description: The name of the shipping method

shippingRate.description: The rate of shipping including pricing details

isMatching.description: Flag indicating if the shipping rate matches the order

shippingMethod.description: The shipping method for the order

id.description: The unique identifier for the delivery

createdAt.description: The date and time when the delivery was created

id.description: The unique identifier for an item in the delivery

quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the delivery

id.description: The unique identifier for the parcel

createdAt.description: The date and time when the parcel was created

trackingData.description: Tracking data related to the parcel

trackingId.description: The tracking ID of the parcel

provider.description: The provider of the shipping service

providerTransaction.description: The transaction ID from the provider

isReturn.description: Flag indicating if the parcel is a return

id.description: The unique identifier for an item in the parcel

quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the parcel

discountedPrice.description: Discounted price information including discounts applied

value.description: The value of the discounted price

discountedAmount.description: The amount after applying the discount

shippingMethodState.description: The state of the shipping method

syncInfo.description: Synchronization information related to the order

syncedAt.description: The date and time when synchronization occurred

returnInfo.description: Information about returns associated with the order

id.description: The unique identifier for the return item

quantity.description: The quantity of the return item

lineItemId.description: The unique identifier for the line item associated with the return item

comment.description: Comments related to the return item

shipmentState.description: The shipment state of the return item

paymentState.description: The payment state of the return item

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the return item was last modified

createdAt.description: The date and time when the return item was created

returnTrackingId.description: The tracking ID associated with the return

returnDate.description: The date and time when the return was initiated

discountCodes.description: Discount codes associated with the order

state.description: The state of the discount code

refusedGifts.description: Gifts in the order that were refused

lastMessageSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the last message related to the order

cart.description: Information about the cart related to the order

custom.description: Custom data related to the order

locale.description: The locale associated with the order

inventoryMode.description: The mode of inventory for the order

shippingRateInput.description: Input related to shipping rate calculations

directDiscounts.description: Direct discounts applied to the order

shippingMode.description: The mode of shipping for the order

taxedShippingPrice.description: The taxed price associated with shipping

transactionFee.description: The transaction fee associated with the order

versionModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the order version was last modified

itemShippingAddresses.description: Shipping addresses associated with specific items in the order
